synopsis.text:
Allen Schezar, a dashing knight, and Van Fanel, a young prince, find their fates intertwined with that of Hitomi, an ordinary high school girl with a penchant for tarot cards and fortune-telling. When Hitomi's premonition of a dragon attack comes true, she is transported to the mystical world of Gaea, where she joins forces with Van and Allen to battle against the oppressive Zaibach empire. As they journey through Gaea, they uncover hidden truths about Van's past, the legendary mecha Escaflowne, and Hitomi's own mysterious powers.

In this epic 26-episode saga, Hitomi, Van, and Allen must navigate a world filled with romance, magic, and giant sword-wielding armor suits. As they struggle against the forces of Zaibach, who seek to conquer Gaea and shape it to their twisted vision of "peace," Hitomi must also confront her own confused heart and the secrets of her destiny. Will she be able to unlock the full potential of her powers and help Van and Allen save Gaea from the clutches of the Zaibach empire? Only time will tell in this thrilling adventure filled with love, loss, and redemption.
